labels: ['node server', 'app', 'esbuild', 'app type', 'api server', 'micro-service']
description: 'A Bit Node Server app component.'
---

A NodeJS server application type for Bit components. It is using the superfast [ESBuild bundler](https://esbuild.github.io/) to ensure optimial performance for building API servers.

Features:
- Server-side HMR (hot module replacement).
- Lighthing fast build and dev experience using ESBuild.
- Binary executable using [Node Single executable applications API](https://nodejs.org/api/single-executable-applications.html#generating-single-executable-preparation-blobs).

## Get started

Create your server component:

```
bit create express-server my-server -e bitdev.node/node-env
```

Run the server:

```
bit run my-server
```

Your server will now listen to the chosen port. Changing files will hot reload into the server.

## Compose the app

Compose the app to create your own instance of this app.

```ts
const MyServer = NodeServer.from({
  name: 'billing-server',
  mainPath: import.meta.resolve('./billing-server.app-root.js'),
});

export default MyServer;
```
